Message.MsgText: P2P_Starting=ODCF8020I: Peer layer starting; process={0}; boot host={1}.
Message.Explanation: The peer communication layer for On Demand Configuration is starting.
The peer communication layer for On Demand Configuration is setting up.

Message.UserResponse: Report to IBM if bad symptoms result.

Message.MsgText: P2PBase_NoPeer=ODCF8005E: There was an unexpected exception while initializing the SON overlay; the exception is {0}.
Message.Explanation: This should not happen. It can be caused by a problem with the configuration or a conflicting other process(es). This process will be unable to communicate in certain important ways unless and until the problem is corrected and this process is restarted.
Message.UserResponse: Consider the details in the exception. Correct any configuration problem, eliminate conflicting use of the configured port(s), or report to IBM.

Message.MsgText: P2P_NoDMgr=ODCF8012I: Unable to find Deployment Manager host name; running standalone.
Message.Explanation: The peer communication layer for On Demand Configuration could not find the host name of the Deployment Manager for this cell; this process will operate as a standalone process.
Message.UserResponse: Ensure that this node is federated into a cell, unless you intend it to operate in standalone mode.

Message.MsgText: P2P_ConfigError=ODCF8014E: Configuration error in peer infrastructure: {0}.
Message.Explanation: The peer communication layer for On Demand Configuration encountered a configuration error.

Message.MsgText: P2P_TestConectFail=ODCF8015I: The unstructured overlay is configured for testing; connection failures will be generated with a probability of {0}.
Message.Explanation: This is a setting used to test failure handling, not to be used in normal operations.
Message.UserResponse: If this testing is not desired, remove the cell custom property named son.connectFailProbability.

Message.Explanation: An informational message that indicates that this server has detected the stop of the indicated process.
An informational message that indicates that this server has detected the start of the indicated process.
The peer communication layer for On Demand Configuration has started.

Message.MsgText: P2P_TestWriteDelay=ODCF8016I: The unstructured overlay is configured for testing; TCP writes will be delayed {0} milliseconds.
Message.Explanation: This is a setting used to test flow control, not to be used in normal operations.
Message.UserResponse: If this testing is not desired, remove the cell custom property named son.writeDelay.

Message.MsgText: P2P_KeepBug15832=ODCF8017I: The unstructured overlay is configured for testing; the fix to bug 15832 is disabled.
Message.Explanation: This is a setting used to expose problems that are exacerbated by bug 15832, not to be used in normal operations.
Message.UserResponse: If this testing is not desired, remove the cell custom property named son.keepBug15832.
